items.name: Greed's Embrace
flavourText: Some would question if the risk was worth it.
The rest were already dead.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants elemental resistances and elemental ailment immunity to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain +34% to all Elemental Resistances
You and nearby allies are Immune to all Elemental Ailments
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants evasion to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2575 additional Evasion Rating
You and nearby allies gain 29% more Evasion rating
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Buff Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
You and nearby allies have +15% chance to Evade Attack Hits
Suppressed Spell Damage dealt to you is Unlucky
hybrid.secDescrText: Casts a temporary aura that grants you and your allies additional chance to evade attacks, and makes suppressed spell damage unlucky against you.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead. Your life cannot be raised above low life other than by flasks, and while above low life, skills will cost life as well as mana.
explicitMods:
Life Recovery other than Flasks cannot Recover Life to above Low Life
When taking Damage from Hits, 40% of Life loss below half Life is Prevented, then 81% of Life loss prevented this way is lost over 4 seconds
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 40% of Base Mana Cost while not on Low Life
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Consumes Rage at an accelerating rate to provide a powerful buff, granting more attack damage, attack speed, movement speed, and less damage taken.
explicitMods: At least 5 Rage required to start Berserking
Each second, 20% more Rage loss Rate
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground in your wake. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: Deals 406 Base Fire Damage per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Dragon Impaler
implicitMods: 30% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
explicitMods: Adds 8 to 146 Lightning Damage to Attacks
+38% to Critical Strike Multiplier with Bows
fracturedMods: Bow Attacks fire an additional Arrow

items.name: Divination Distillate
explicitMods: 12% increased Quantity of Items found during Effect
30% increased Rarity of Items found during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Knowledge is fermented in pain and loss
Distilled with reflection
To quench the thirst of those
who dream of enlightenment

items.name: Goldwyrm
flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports bow attack skills, causing them to trigger when you've spent enough mana in total on other bow attacks. Cannot modify the skills of minions. Cannot support totems, traps, mines, Vaal skills, or channelling skills
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 10% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
Supported Skills deal 1% more Damage with Hits and Ailments per 1 Mana Cost

Supported Skills Trigger once total Mana Spent on other Bow
Attacks exceeds 300% of their Mana Cost
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs an attack that gives the character a frenzy charge if it hits. Frenzy charges increase your attack speed.
explicitMods: 5% more Attack Damage per Frenzy Charge
5% more Attack Speed per Frenzy Charge
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 20% increased Critical Strike Chance
Supported Skills have 55% chance to gain a Power Charge on Critical Strike
Supported Skills deal 4% more Damage per Power Charge
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow that remains in the ground behind its final target, tethering that enemy to it. Ensnared enemies always count as moving, and have less movement speed while trying to break the snare. The snare will break if they leave the area of effect.
explicitMods: Ensnared Enemies take 20% increased Projectile Damage from Attack Hits
Each Snare applies 40% less Movement Speed to Normal or Magic Enemies
Each Snare applies 30% less Movement Speed to Rare Enemies
Each Snare applies 25% less Movement Speed to Unique Enemies
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Headhunter
explicitMods: 28% increased Damage with Hits against Rare monsters
When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain its Modifiers for 60 seconds
flavourText: "A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and
judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.
The head is where the Man is."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

items.name: Chimeric Reach
enchantMods: Quality does not increase Physical Damage
explicitMods: +56% Critical Strike Multiplier while a Rare or Unique Enemy is Nearby

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill. Minions, Totems, Traps and Mines cannot gain Inspiration Charges.

Gain an Inspiration Charge when you Spend Mana on Upfront
Costs or Effects of Supported Skills
Supported Skills have 20% increased Inspiration Charge Duration
Lose all Inspiration Charges after Spending a total of 800 Mana on Upfront Costs and Effects of Supported Skills

Supported Skills have 8% increased Critical Strike Chance per Inspiration Charge

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports attack skills that can be used with bows. Supported skills can only be used with bows. Cannot support Vaal skills, minion skills, movement skills, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 11% increased Attack Damage

When you Hit an Enemy with an Arrow from a Supported Skill, Summon a Mirage Archer which uses that Skill
Mirage Archer can use Triggered Attacks as though they were not Triggered
Mirage Archer uses Supported Skill with 60% less Attack Speed
Mirage Archer deals 31% less Damage with Supported Skills
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires a piercing shot that travels until it reaches the targeted location. It will then fire projectiles out in all directions from that point, which will travel for a short time before disappearing.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills that hit enemies, causing them to gain bonuses while you have resonance of all three elements, and to grant resonance of elements other than the highest one in a hit. There is a maximum of 50 Resonance for each Element. Cannot support triggered skills, instant skills, orb skills, brands, skills with a reservation, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
explicitMods:
Hits with Supported Skills for which the highest Damage Type is Elemental cause you to gain 25 Resonance of other Elements per second for 2 seconds
Lose 5 Resonance per second of each Element you are not gaining
Supported Skills deal 3% more Elemental Damage per 5 of lowest Resonance
Supported Skills penetrate 16% Elemental Resistances while each Resonance is at least 25
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Elemental Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

And Ventor met his latest trophy.
